bugs.title: Fixed Container DNS Resolution
bugs.description: DNS resolution inside containers was not updated following host network changes.

bugs.title: Fixed SSH Daemon Disable
bugs.description: The SSH daemon appeared as enabled in system settings when it was actually disabled.

bugs.title: Fixed Wayland Installer Session
bugs.description: Fixed the Wayland session for the installer ISO.

bugs.title: Fixed Image Unmount in Installer
bugs.description: Albius did not properly unmount the image after installation.

enhancements.title: GNOME 49
enhancements.description: This release includes the new version of the GNOME desktop environment, which brings many improvements such as enhanced remote desktop.

enhancements.title: Overhauled Filesystem Structure
enhancements.description: Redesigned the root filesystem structure for better compatibility with GNOME Files and the new image loader.

enhancements.title: New Package Repository
enhancements.description: Introduced a new package repository synced with Debian snapshot archive, improving build reproducibility.

enhancements.title: Upgraded ABRoot
enhancements.description: ABRoot now supports rebase command for easier base image switching, and can handle multi-architecture images using Prometheus.

enhancements.title: Added runroot Command
enhancements.description: New runroot command for safer privileged operations.

enhancements.title: Updated Translations
enhancements.description: Refreshed and improved translations across the system.
